body.name: Mecity Coffee Maker 2024 New Compact Coffee Machine Compatible With K-cup Coffee Capsule, Ground Coffee, Tea 11 inches Tall 4.7 inches Wide, Auto Shut Off 120V 1000W
features: 2 Minute Instant Brewing: Mecity mini coffee maker features for its fast heating technology, after you touched the start button, a cup of hot coffee will be ready within 2 minutes, just standby and watch a short video, you are good to go.

Good For Coffee & Tea: This coffee machine comes with 2 filter holders, one is for K-cup coffee capsules, and the other one is for ground coffee & tea. You can enjoy different kinds of beverage with this tiny drip coffee maker.

Space Saver on your Counter: The dimension of this coffee maker is 11" H * 4.7"W * 9.8"D, it saves a lot of space on your contertop and suitable for traveling, especially good for domotory and apartment.

One Button Touch Control: The operation is very simple, touch to turn on, start/cancel brewing, enter descale mode. It also has auto shut off function, you can brew a needed size or just brew with all the water in the reservoir.

Easy To Clean: Unlike other coffee maker splashes coffee grounds around, Mecity coffee machine uses unique designed filter holder, it will make the brewing chamber easy to clean, thus prevents the production of odor.
Descale Mode: Press the power button for 3 seconds, a red indicator will start flashing, it is in descaling now, it will quit descale mode when it has been cancelled or water has run out.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introduction of Mecity Mini Coffee Maker * Pink color and white color will be available in a month.
Features of Mecity KC3002 Suitable for coffee and loose teaSpace saver for your countertopEasy operation with touch buttonInstant brewing within 2 minutesAuto shut off protection

Other Features One Button Control Touch to turn on the machine, start brewing, cancel brewing, and enter descale mode. Removable Drip Tray After removed the drip tray, the size of the largest cup could fit in is Φ3.7 inch X 6.5 inch Unique Filter Holder Included 2 filter pods, one is for K-cup capsules and the other one is for ground coffee & tea. It is easier in cleaing when compared to other holders 12 Fl.Oz Water Reservoir KC3002 simplified the brew program, you can add needed water and brew then all at once, thus will keep your every cup fresh.

How To Descale The Machine When the water flow is slower than it used to be, please descale the machine. * Long press the start button for 3 second until the red indicator starts flashing, it is in descale mode. * Follow the instructions above to descale the machine. * Do not use too fine grounded coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No frill, but thrilled with it so far!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This petite coffeemaker has turned out to be the perfect morning remedy for our daughter in her tiny college dormitory.With kitchen counter space at a premium, she has been looking for a source for morning java that doesn’t take up a large counter footprint. We weren’t familiar with the Mecity brand but with the listed features, compact size and sleek basic black appearance, we figured it was worth a try. As an added benefit, it matched the black, white and silver kitchen décor in my daughter’s dorm.The appliance works with both K-cups and ground coffee which makes it very versatile for college kids who like to try specialty brands and boutique flavors. It’s also a very efficient hot water dispenser for teas. All reports from the dorm confirm that the coffees and teas have been full flavored and delicious.At only 11 inches tall, less than 10 inches deep and less than 5 inches wide, this can fit snugly on just about any size kitchen countertop or even on a desk top if you want to have a cuppa on hand when you’re working or studying. Operation is a one-touch breeze using nothing more than the front button and either inserting a K-cup or grounds.The unit features 2-minute brewing which is great for those early mornings when you need a quick pick me up punch of caffeine. It has easy to follow instructions so you’re downing your coffee or tea in no time flat. It’s easy clean up, too, especially when you are using coffee grounds because the Mecity grounds holder uses an inner shell to hold the grounds in place within the outer capsule – nothing goes splashing around and all the used grounds stay in the shell instead of staining the inside of the brewing chamber.Every automatic coffee maker gets funky after awhile so you’ll have to clean it out. You can easily descale simply by pressing and then holding the power button for three seconds. The machine will automatically descale until the process is complete or until it runs out of water. You should repeat this process at least three times to make sure the system is clean and then you won’t have any aftertaste or lingering odors.Speaking of running out of water, the one minor defect of the machine is that the water well only holds 12 ounces of it. Of course, the small size of the unit pretty much dictates this, so I’d suggest – as my daughter does – to keep a water bottle full and handy for quick refills on those days when two or three cups just don’t wake you up.Overall, my daughter and her roommate report that the machine is a neat little no frills coffee maker. It’s a few steps up from the nicer hotel models but nothing really fancy. It’s functional and flavorful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and perfect to have in my home office
reviews.reviewText: I was not expecting much from this compact K-Cup and ground coffee machine - it looked too "basic"I got it on a whim so I could whip up some coffee when I am working in my home office. I was pleasantly surprised!First it has a nice sleek unassuming design, it doesn't look cheap [that was one of my concerns].It has two methods for brewing, you can use a k-cup or use your own ground coffee or tea.One button operation. Heats up fast and within seconds the coffee starts brewing.Auto shut off. Dispenses 6, 8 and 12 oz servings. Even has a descale feature.BUT none of these features matter if it doesn't produce a good cup of coffee! And it does! It makes a delicious cup of coffee. This machine may look basic but sometimes simple is best. And that is what I found in this little compact coffee maker. Yes, I recommend it 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile coffee machine
reviews.reviewText: We probably don't need another coffee machine at home, but I do need one at work. Usually at home, I try to make my own cold brews and grind my own beans. However, at work, there's just no time to do that.What I like about this machine is that I can either use k-cups or bring my own fresh ground coffee from home. You get 2 different inserts depending on what you want to make. What I like about this machine is the ease of use. Also, I like that the powercord rolls back I to the unit to save space. We will see how this hold up over time as most my vacuums with similar cords end up not working in time. It is made of mostly plastic bits which is fine for the price, but it does feel a little less luxurious. Overall, this makes a good brew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Little Machine
reviews.reviewText: This simple, basic coffee maker is quite the workhorse. It can brew both k-cups or ground coffee or tea. The water reservoir opening is large enough to eliminate spills when filling. It heats quickly, dispenses quickly & only makes a few little squeaky noises as it finishes. Pour fresh water with every cup, rather than having a large reservoir of stale water. No need for wasteful paper filters. Simple one-button operation. Cord can be shoved back inside the unit, if desired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Basically a hotel coffee-maker.
reviews.reviewText: As stated above, this is basically a hotel coffee maker. It comes with a regular filter and a k-cup adaptor. It doesn’t have a reservoir; you fill it each time you brew a cup of coffee. It’s still easier than my French press, which is why I wanted it, but it’s not as nice as a name brand single brew. The coffee it brews is passable – at least as good as a k-cup brand machine with a filter-adaptor. It’s not great, but the convenience is worth it most days. For what it is, it isn’t bad, but I wouldn’t go out of my way to get one either.”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect 1 Cup Coffee Machine
reviews.reviewText: I don't care for most of the K cup coffees so having this little machine that allows me to use my own brand and strength of coffee is perfect, while still having the option to use a K cup if so desired.It is so simple to use that it makes fixing that first cup of coffee in the morning, with blurry eyes, a snap. Just pour in the cup of water, add your coffee to the basket, place your cup and push the button. Wait 2 minutes or less and you've got that first eye opening cup of coffee.Love this little machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice k-cup coffee maker. It’s perfect for my husband’s home office. He almost likes it better than the keurig that he’s replacing. The main difference he notices is that the coffee is hotter, which he loves! This is a great compact coffee maker. Perfect for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: It's a very cute coffee maker. It's very lightweight and it doesn't take much space which was really important because I wanted to put it in the camper. It heats up really nice and makes coffee pretty fast. The one downside is the electrical cord is a little on the short side.Be sure to read the directions well. At first, I thought it wasn’t working because I had followed the directions, and it was working. As it turns out, I missed one step. You push the power button to heat up the water and you push it again when you are ready to brew the coffee.
